title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Task-Based Design Process for Improving Scientific Problem-Solving Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causes of ambiguous situations in science experiment design with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write step-by-step procedures for solving science problems with over 90% completeness by referencing work examples.
Learners can revise and improve ambiguities identified in their own experimental designs through peer evaluation at least three times.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
